translations: adj.玩厌了的，厌烦于享乐的
n.（Blase）人名；（德）布拉泽；（法）布拉斯

phrs.translation: 厌烦于享乐或人生的, 厌于享乐的, 对享乐感到厌倦的, 厌倦的

sentences.sentence: Chan has been known to be blase about his Hollywood work.
sentences.translation: 众所周知，成龙已经对他的好莱坞工作心生厌倦。

sentences.sentence: If you fly much, you see these things and learn to act blase about them.
sentences.translation: 如果你经历多了，你就会对这些事情表现出漠不关心。

sentences.sentence: Having been very blase about the whole thing, I found the reality absurdly moving.
sentences.translation: 出于对整件事的漠不关心，我发现现实在荒谬地进行着。
